Class Background::DiskHandler
In: lib/core_ext/handlers/disk_handler.rb
Parent: Object

Stores the serialized block on disk. This handler is probably most useful as a fallback handler.

Methods

handle   recover  

Public Class methods

handle(locals, options = {}, &block)

Marshals the block and the locals into a file in the folder specified by dirname.

[Source]

recover(handler)

Replays all marshalled background tasks in the order in which they were stored into the folder specified by dirname.

[Source]

    # File lib/core_ext/handlers/disk_handler.rb, line 18
18:     def self.recover(handler)
19:       handler_class = "Background::#{handler.to_s.camelize}Handler".constantize
20:       Dir.entries(dirname).grep(/^background/).sort.each do |filename|
21:         path = "#{dirname}/#{filename}"
22:         File.open(path, 'r') do |file|
23:           code, variables = Marshal.load(file)
24:           handler_class.handle(variables, &code)
25:         end
26:         FileUtils.rm(path)
27:       end
28:     end
